languages.text: "Соломон, зачем эта сцена? Обвинение старших офицеров перед всем мостиком?"

traits.locale_text: "Соломон, как ты смеешь обвинять моих старших офицеров на глазах их подчиненных?"

languages.text: "Solomorne, why stage this scene? Accusing senior officers in front of the entire bridge?"
languages.original_text: "Соломон, зачем эта сцена? Обвинение старших офицеров перед всем мостиком?"

traits.locale_text: "Solomorne, why stage this scene? Accusing senior officers in front of the entire bridge?"
"Solomorne, why stage this scene? Accusing senior officers in front of the entire bridge?"
"Solomorne, why stage this scene? Accusing senior officers in front of the entire bridge?"
"Solomorne, why stage this scene? Accusing senior officers in front of the entire bridge?"
"Solomorne, why stage this scene? Accusing senior officers in front of the entire bridge?"

languages.text: 「なぜこんな場をわざわざ作ったんだ？ブリッジの皆の前で上級士官たちを告発するなんて」
languages.original_text: "Solomorne, why stage this scene? Accusing senior officers in front of the entire bridge?"

traits.locale_text: 「なぜこんな場をわざわざ作ったんだ？ブリッジの皆の前で上級士官たちを告発するなんて」

languages.text: "Böyle olay çıkarmaktaki amacın ne Solomorne? Tüm köprünün gözleri önünde kıdemli subaylarımızı suçluyorsun..."
languages.original_text: "Solomorne, why stage this scene? Accusing senior officers in front of the entire bridge?"

traits.locale_text: "Böyle mevzu çıkarmanın amacı nedir Solomorne? Tüm köprünün gözleri önünde kıdemli subaylarımızı suçluyorsun..."

languages.text: «Solomorne, ¿a qué viene esta escena? ¿Por qué acusa a oficiales de alto rango delante de todo el puente?».
languages.original_text: "Solomorne, why stage this scene? Accusing senior officers in front of the entire bridge?"

traits.locale_text: «Solomorne, ¿a qué viene esta escena? ¿Por qué acusa a oficiales de alto rango delante de todo el puente?».

languages.text: “你非要把事情闹得这么大吗，索罗蒙？当着整个舰桥所有人的面，指控高阶军官？”
languages.original_text: "Solomorne, why stage this scene? Accusing senior officers in front of the entire bridge?"

traits.locale_text: “你非要把事情闹得这么大吗，索罗蒙？当着整个舰桥所有人的面，指控高阶军官？”

languages.text: « Pourquoi une telle mise en scène, Solomorne ? Pourquoi accuser des officiers supérieurs devant la passerelle tout entière ? »
languages.original_text: "Solomorne, why stage this scene? Accusing senior officers in front of the entire bridge?"

traits.locale_text: « Pourquoi une telle mise en scène, Solomorne ? Pourquoi accuser des officiers supérieurs devant la passerelle tout entière ? »

languages.text: "Solomorne, was soll das hier? Ihr beschuldigt leitende Offiziere vor der versammelten Brücke?"
languages.original_text: "Solomorne, why stage this scene? Accusing senior officers in front of the entire bridge?"

traits.locale_text: "Solomorne, was soll das hier? Ihr beschuldigt leitende Offiziere vor der versammelten Brücke?"
